title: Hybrid Will Not Enter READY Mode
symptom_short: Vehicle powers on but will not enter READY mode
recommended_checks: Scan hybrid control modules for codes.
Verify all doors and hood are fully closed.
safety_warning: High-voltage systems are dangerous. Do not touch orange cables.

title: Poor Fuel Economy in Hybrid Vehicle
symptom_short: Hybrid fuel economy much lower than normal

likely_causes.cause: Cooling fan or battery temperature issue

recommended_checks: Scan hybrid battery data (state of charge, temps).
Inspect battery cooling fan and filter.
Review driving patterns and tire pressure.
safety_warning: Ignoring battery cooling issues can shorten battery life.

title: Hybrid System Warning Light On
symptom_short: Hybrid or EV warning message displayed
recommended_checks: Scan hybrid ECU for detailed fault codes.
safety_warning: High-voltage faults can disable the vehicle suddenly.

title: EV Reduced Power or Limp Mode
symptom_short: Vehicle limits power or speed unexpectedly
recommended_checks: Allow vehicle to cool down and recheck.
Inspect cooling pumps and coolant levels.
safety_warning: Continuing to drive in reduced power may cause further system shutdown.

title: EV or Plug-in Hybrid Not Charging
symptom_short: Charging cable connected but charging does not start

likely_causes.cause: Faulty charge cable or charging station
Vehicle charge port or onboard charger fault

recommended_checks: Try a different charging station or cable.
Inspect charge port for debris or damage.
safety_warning: Do not force connectors. Damaged charging equipment can be dangerous.
